title.oldValue: Microsoft Viva: Expanded Viva Goals Analytics Feature
title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Enhanced Viva Goals Analytics Feature

description.oldValue: Viva Goals Analytics now includes actionable insights and recommendations expanded to team admins, OKR Champions, and organization admins.
description.newValue: OKR program Analytics report for all teams, with enhanced help content, additional metrics and filters to enable slicing the analytics report by a variety of parameters and take informed decisions.
